document.full_text: former los angeles dodgers chief executive jamie mccourt has asked a judge to order the immediate sale of the debt-ridden franchise to avert a possible takeover of the club by major league baseball (mlb).
document.title: jamie mccourt seeks immediate sale of the dodgers
lines_and_colors: former los angeles dodgers chief executive jamie mccourt has asked a judge to order the immediate sale of the debt-ridden franchise to avert a possible takeover of the club by major league baseball (mlb).
